title: Hello lol community
body: Hi i want to say hi becouse i have many times in holidays so many trolls and bad teams but i still trying pushing my elo up :) i am actually gold V but teams like this what i have these days i really can say how i enjoy this game is there any chance to have more active admins ? It will be so much helpfull when admins ban bad positive players ..:)

replies.body: We do our best to catch negativity in games, and you can help us notice it by making use of the report feature in the post game lobby. If you're having a hard time finding good teammates, you should try hitting up Player Recruitment to see if any groups could use a 5th member!
